combined_analysis_no_issues: Combined accessibility analysis found no issues.
combined_results_description: Combined results from all selected accessibility testing tools
enter_complete_url: Enter a complete URL including http:// or https://
enter_url_check_wcag: Enter a website URL to check WCAG compliance
footer_text: WCAG Compliance Checker. Built with Nuxt 4, Axe-core, and Pa11y.
loading_moment: This may take a few moments...
page_description: Professional WCAG compliance checker using Axe and Pa11y for comprehensive web accessibility auditing and reporting.
page_title: WCAG Compliance Checker - Web Accessibility Testing
pdf_generation_error: Error generating PDF report. Please try again.
select_tools_description: Select one or both tools for comprehensive accessibility testing. For Pa11y, choose the runners to use.
wcag_20_a_description: Basic level of accessibility. Published in 2008.
wcag_20_a_recommendation: Outdated - recommended to upgrade to a newer version.
wcag_20_aa_description: Standard level of accessibility required by most legal regulations.
wcag_20_aa_recommendation: Outdated - recommended to upgrade to WCAG 2.1 AA or 2.2 AA.
wcag_20_aaa_description: Highest level of accessibility in WCAG 2.0.
wcag_21_a_description: Basic level with additional criteria for mobile devices and cognitive aspects.
wcag_21_a_recommendation: Good starting point, but AA level is recommended.
wcag_21_aa_description: Recommended standard for most websites. Adds 17 new criteria to WCAG 2.0.
wcag_21_aa_recommendation: Optimal choice for most projects - widely legally accepted.
wcag_21_aaa_description: Highest level of accessibility in WCAG 2.1.
wcag_21_aaa_recommendation: Excellent for critical services, but may be difficult to fully implement.
wcag_22_a_description: Latest basic level with additional cognitive criteria.
wcag_22_aa_description: Latest AA standard with 9 new success criteria published in October 2023.
wcag_22_aa_recommendation: Latest and best choice - future-proof legal standard.
wcag_22_aaa_description: Highest current level of accessibility with latest requirements.
wcag_22_aaa_recommendation: Ideal for organizations aiming for the highest accessibility.
